titles: A letter of examination to all who have assumed the place of shepherds, herdsmen, and overseers of the flocks of people of all sorts in Christendom : to see if your accounts be ready and what order the flocks be in : with a few lines of good news to the several flocks.
author: Edmundson, William, 1627-1712.
notes: Signed and dated: William Edmondson, Jamaica, the 24th of the 12th month 1671.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Society of Friends. --  Pastoral letters and charges.
